title.rendered: Financial Commission Announces Capital Level as Latest Approved Member

content.rendered:
January 15th, 2018, leading external dispute resolution (EDR) organization, Financial Commission, catering to the financial services industry and operated by FinaCom PLC, today announces Capital Level as its newest approved Member.

Capital Level status as an A-category Member of the Financial Commission took effect on January 12, 2018, following the approval of its membership application by Financial Commission, thus allowing the company and its customers access to a wide range of services and membership benefits including, but not limited to, protection for up to €20,000 per submitted complaint, backed by the Financial Commission’s compensation fund.

Financial Commission provides brokerages and their customers with an unbiased 3rd party mediation platform that helps resolve complaints in instances when parties are unable to directly come to an agreement over disputes.

For approved members and their clients participating in CFDs and foreign exchange (forex) markets, Financial Commission helps facilitate a simpler, swifter resolution process than through typical regulatory channels such as arbitration or local court systems.

Capital Level joins a diverse range of brokerages and independent services providers (ISPs) that utilise the services of the Financial Commission and as part of their commitment to their clients while upholding membership requirements.

About Capital Level

Capital Level is a trading name registered and licensed with the Financial Services Commission of Mauritius. The company offers execution services solely, standing for the highest standards of transparency towards its clients, execution speed, liquidity and the lowest price latency available in the market. Capital Level does not offer consultancy services, money management, or investment advise/recommendations of any kind. The company follows a NDD (no dealing desk) business model, the execution of its clients’ orders being 100% automatised, without any human intervention. Capital Level offers 100+ various symbols (FX currency pairs, US stocks, US commodities, US indices, precious metals) available for trading on the Meta Trader 5 platform the company offers.

For more information please contact Capital Level at contact@capitallevel.com

About Financial Commission

Financial Commission is an independent external dispute resolution (EDR) organization for consumers/traders who are unable to resolve disputes directly with their financial services providers that are members of the Financial Commission. Financial Commission initially set out to provide a new approach for traders and brokers alike to resolve any issues that arise in the course of trading electronic markets such Foreign Exchange, and then expanded into CFDs and related derivatives, in addition to certifying technology platforms used for trading.

For more information please contact us at info@financialcommission.org
